definition.en:
This datatype allows a respondant to specify one of the following:
  • YES
    (numerical value 1)
  • NO
    (numerical value 2)

This datatype allows a respondant to specify one of the following:
  • YES OBSERVED
    (numerical value 1)
  • YES REPORTED BUT NOT SEEN
    (numerical value 2)
  • NO
    (numerical value 3)
